name: @dwightbcoder/action-ui
description: Action UI is a Javascript framework for building event-base user interfaces

scripts.babel:dev: NODE_ENV=dev babel src/bundle.js -d dist && mv dist/bundle.js dist/action-ui.js
scripts.babel:prod: NODE_ENV=production babel src/bundle.js -d dist && mv dist/bundle.js dist/action-ui.min.js
scripts.build: npm run rollup && npm run babel:dev && npm run babel:prod && rm -r dist/es6 && cp -a src dist/es6
scripts.build:example: npm run build && npm run build:example1 && npm run build:example2

author: Dwight Brown
